price: Suyo es el reino de los cielos y de la Tierra. Y a Dios retornan todos los asuntos.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
